Hey there, I'm Daniel Canetti. But you can call me Dan.

I'm a web developer based in Yorkshire, England and I work with a modern technology stack to deliver quality results. I am proud to have worked with and for some of countries most promising companies.

I'm the currently the lead developer at Nouveau Beauty Group and I'm not currently looking for a new role. If you're a recruitment agent feel free to connect over on LinkedIn.
